mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.placesandactivities

Class PAVComponentBase<I extends PAVComponent<I,P>,P extends PescadorMVPPlace>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.placesandactivities.PAVComponentBase<I,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - Place class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component<I>, PAVComponent<I,P>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueryComponentImpl

    public abstract class PAVComponentBase<I extends PAVComponent<I,P>,P extends PescadorMVPPlace>
extends Object
implements PAVComponent<I,P>
    Provides a means for linking a place class to activity and view classes for parts of the UI (regions), using factories to get the concrete implementations for these classes
